summary: Unlink the existing product from SSP, keeping the existing info
description: Unlink the existing product from SSP, keeping the existing info.

query.name: pitem_id
query.description: ID of item under SIP Primary Shop.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_aitem_by_pitem_id?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&pitem_id=843997615&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: aitem_id
schema.description: ID of item under SIP Affiliate Shop corresponding to the P Item.

schema.name: model_mapping_list
schema.description: If the P Item does not have model, then the model_mapping_list will not be returned.

schema.name: pmodel_id
schema.description: ID of model for the P Item.

schema.name: amodel_id
schema.description: ID of model for the A Item.
